markdown:
'''Accessories''' are miscellaneous wearable items in {{poe1}} and {{poe2}}.

## {{game|poe1}}

The available types are:
* [Amulets](/pillarsOfEternityAmulets/), neck slot
* [Rings](/pillarsOfEternityRings/), ring slots
* [Belts](/pillarsOfEternityBelts/), waist slots

The following types are categorized as '''Clothing''':
* [Handwear](/pillarsOfEternityHandwear/), hands slot (includes [bracers](/bracers/), [gauntlets](/gauntlets/), and [gloves](/gloves/))
* [Headgear](/pillarsOfEternityHeadgear/), head slot (includes [hats](/hats/) and [helmets](/helmets/))
* [Cloaks](/pillarsOfEternityCloaks/), neck slot
* [Boots](/pillarsOfEternityBoots/), feet slots

## {{game|poe2}}

{{Main|Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire accessories}}
The available types are:
* [Headgear](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAccessoriesHeadgear/), head slot
* [Amulets](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAccessoriesAmulets/), neck slot
* [Cloaks](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAccessoriesCloaks/), cape slot
* [Handwear](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAccessoriesHandwear/), hands slot
* [Rings](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAccessoriesRings/), ring slots
* [Boots](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAccessoriesBoots/), feet slot
* [Belts](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAccessoriesBelts/), waist slot
* [Trinkets](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAccessoriesTrinkets/), grimoire/trinket slot

[ ](/categoryPillarsOfEternityItems/)
[ ](/categoryPillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireItems/)
raw:
'''Accessories''' are miscellaneous wearable items in {{poe1}} and {{poe2}}.

=={{game|poe1}}==
The available types are:
* [[Pillars of Eternity amulets|Amulets]], neck slot
* [[Pillars of Eternity rings|Rings]], ring slots
* [[Pillars of Eternity belts|Belts]], waist slots

The following types are categorized as '''Clothing''':
* [[Pillars of Eternity handwear|Handwear]], hands slot (includes [[bracers]], [[gauntlets]], and [[gloves]])
* [[Pillars of Eternity headgear|Headgear]], head slot (includes [[hats]] and [[helmets]])
* [[Pillars of Eternity cloaks|Cloaks]], neck slot
* [[Pillars of Eternity boots|Boots]], feet slots

=={{game|poe2}}==
{{Main|Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire accessories}}
